synopsis.native: Narra la historia de cinco mineros cautivos en una galería a 600 metros de profundidad tras producirse un gran derrumbe en una mina de Asturias.
synopsis.english: A group of mine-workers try to find a way to survive after to be trapped by a collapse in the mining gallery where they were working.
